This review is for only the Scrub Top, not the pants. The top fits almost perfectly for the size. I normally wear a 2X tall, but tall was not available at the time of purchase. I usually can substitute with a 3X. The 3X I ordered fit exactly as any 3X I've bought has fit. I do wish it was just a bit longer. I am 6'4" and could use the extra length. There is no stretch in the fabric and it is a fairly lightweight fabric. I think this a decent buy, that runs true to size.

评论概述: Size difference is a bit extreme
评论详情: I’ve worn 2XL standard Cherokee scrubs for a long time but I decided to get some with stretch this time (Corona 15) and did Amazon Wardrobe to try 2XL vs 3XL. I stuck with 2XL which fits like normal, or even better due to the stretch fabric. I tried on the 3XL and WOW the difference in size is huge, almost comically so. I checked to make sure it was the same style number and it was. Just know to try both sizes if it’s your first time wearing these or you’re in between sizes. There is a great difference and they run quite large.

评论概述: Great product! Sizing is weird for petites.
评论详情: The product itself is great. It is high quality, heavy drape scrubs, with no stretch. They will last a long time on the floor, and put up with numerous washes. I am 5’1” and currently 200lbs. After reading reviews about sizing, I was concerned about sticking with my normal 2X, so I went for 3X. I don’t know if there is a size I could order in this particular scrub top that would fit me right because it is so dad-blasted LONG! I’d feel like I was wearing the world’s boxiest prom dress to work every shift. Also, I’ve read previous reviews claiming that the Cherokee scrub tops from different lines don’t always match pants from other Cherokee lines, and it was true in this case. I bought “Galaxy Blue” in this scrub top and the same “galaxy blue” in pants from a different Cherokee line, and the shades don’t match... At all. You know when your S.O. tries to wear a neon green shirt with a pair of hunter green pants, and looks at you all stupid when you don’t want be seen with them and then they whine, “But it’s the same color! Doesn’t it MATCH?” Yeah. That’s how well the shades match. No biggie though. Just buy neutral bottoms and fun colored tops, or vice versa! Don’t try to match!
Bought these for my husband’s job. They fit perfect he’s about 5’9” 175lbs. I bought a Medium and they work fine. I’m really happy that the eggplant color is as advertised. Will buy again.

评论详情: Love Cherokee scrubs! That's all I wear. These are so comfortable even if they're slightly big (that's probably why they're so comfy).

评论概述: Bring back WW Flex with Certainty!!!
评论详情: I've been wearing the Cherokee WW Flex with Certainty Unisex top and bottom (34777A and 34100A) for almost a year now and I couldn't be happier. I brought these because my current scrubs are starting to pill in my perineum area as the fabric in that area is constantly rubbing against each other. I brought two pairs of these scrubs with the matching pants and I was not satisfied. The pants have a more fit feel compared to my WW flex and much less stretch compared to my WW flex. I have an athletic build and I need a good amount of thigh room and so forth. The scrub top itself is much longer and baggier than my WW flex. As my mentor would say, Cherokee get your sh** together and stop changing sizes we all already love.
Everything was fine nice materials , confortable

评论概述: The sturdy construction will work nicely as he is tough on ...
评论详情: I bought these for my son's new job.  He said they fit with room to spare and loves the give in the stretchy material.  He is a 4XL in a shirt and he had room to wear a t shirt underneath.  The shirts are made of heavy solid construction cotton with a stretchy give to the body and sleeves of the shirt.  The sturdy construction will work nicely as he is tough on clothes and works in a lab environment.
Great!

评论概述: Good pockets and material, horrible fit
评论详情: The fit is huge but somehow still constricting in the shoulders and upper back. I'm 5'9" about 160lbs, athletic build and went with a medium, which somehow is large enough in the waist for me and a friend but still constricts arm movement. It's pretty important for me to have comfortable arm movement in scrubs. There is no stretch even though it says it on the sleeve. Don't care too much about how they look (baggy in the wrong places), but functional fit and comfort is important and these just don't have it. They constrict my shoulder flexion and droop too much when I put things in the pockets and lean over at all. If you're a lean, athletic person and have a smaller waist than shoulder circumference don't get theses, there are better options. Just OK because of the pockets. Don't fit like the picture.

评论详情: Husband likes these basic scrubs. He states that they are comfortable and cheap. They do tend to wrinkle after washing, and they pick up lint (just like nearly all other scrubs). He continues to purchase more of these when the old ones wear out.
